plot: When his father accidently commits a crime and is sentenced to a year in prison and his mother runs off with her lover, a young boy is left alone to fend for himself while he waits dutifully for his parents to return.
title: Yujeong cheonri
plot_es: When his father accidently commits a crime and is sentenced to a year in prison and his mother runs off with her lover, a young boy is left alone to fend for himself while he waits dutifully for his parents to return.
plot_en: When his father accidently commits a crime and is sentenced to a year in prison and his mother runs off with her lover, a young boy is left alone to fend for himself while he waits dutifully for his parents to return.
